gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT] Meteoblue disagrees with the baseline, showing a dry forecast. Meteoblue predicts 0-0.1" of rainfall, against the baseline's 35% chance of rain. As the saying goes, weather predictions can be as unpredictable as a monkey in a windstorm.
